description.en: Mitsuteru Yokoyama, a master artist with a variety of masterpieces, tells a Sengoku period story about the activities of young Dosan Saito and his one-eyed ninja Saruhiko. Saruhiko, who is attacked by the enemy and is on the verge of death, seeks help from the house of Shogoro, an oil seller. There, Shogoro, who took care of Saruhiko, copies the secret documents that Saruhiko had and uses them to be recommended to the samurai ranks. However, Shogoro, who was about to be cut down by Saruhiko who noticed his actions, arranged for Saruhiko's backup with the promise of a promotion...!?

biography.en: a Japanese manga artist born in Suma Ward of Kobe City in Hyōgo Prefecture. His personal name was originally spelled Mitsuteru (光照), with the same pronunciation. His works include Tetsujin 28, Giant Robo, Akakage, Babel II, Sally the Witch, Princess Comet, many adaptations of the Chinese classics Water Margin, Romance of the Three Kingdoms and The Records of The Grand Historian and manga biographies based on historical figures like Oda Nobunaga and Genghis Khan.
